metadata.description:
Hey guys it’s SLOE JACK. I’m beyond excited to be back on Sound to premiere my upcoming track, “SLOW DOWN”. It is one of the 4 new singles on my debut project, ‘BACKSTAB’.

“SLOW DOWN” is about having big dreams in a room full of doubters. As someone who grew up in a small country town, I quickly learned that the people I surround myself with will determine my future. This song talks about the judgement that surrounded me before I moved to the city and the importance of self belief. 

This is the focus track off my debut EP ‘BACKSTAB’. 

‘BACKSTAB’ dives into the events of my abusive upbringing and my life-long battle with trauma and self sabotage. It dissects the moment in my life where I reject happiness and stability in pursuit of chaos. This project was very therapeutic to write!

Finally, I’d like to thank everyone at Sound for welcoming me back on their platform. I am so thankful for the opportunity!

 -Sloe

lyrics.text:
Slow down
Wish you told me that before I got the room to jump round
People bangin’ my sound out the speakers now I
Hear the demons in my life try to stab me from behind
Because they know we’re gonna ride and that we’ll never stop

Slow down I’m addicted to the lifestyle
All the people want me now that I’m a winner
Slow down I’m addicted to the lifestyle
All the people want me now that I can’t slow down
Slow down I’m addicted to the lifestyle
All the people want me now that I’m a winner
Slow down I’m addicted to the lifestyle
All the people want me now that I can’t slow down

I say will I ever get a minute to breathe
They say wanna hangout with me
I don’t wanna be a record player walking the street
I don’t wanna be stuck on the leash
I just wanna get mine
I say it all the time if I could recommend
As you blow up make a bunch of friends and let them in
Day one on my side I’m on the road now
Tell them have a nice life we ain’t gonna slow

Slow down I’m addicted to the lifestyle
All the people want me now that I’m a winner
Slow down I’m addicted to the lifestyle
All the people want me now that I can’t slow down
Slow down I’m addicted to the lifestyle
